name: Munchman (Keypunch Software)
overview: A simple Pac Man style game that was part of the "Arcade Games (3 Pack)", the Australian Galaxions/Munchman combo pack and "Arcade Games I" pack. Munch your way around the maze, eating the dots, while avoiding the 4 hungry ghosts. A power pill in each corner of the maze, when eaten, allows you to gobble the ghosts for a short time. Delicious fruits yield high bonus points and a free muncher is given at 20,000 points. The cart version features a two player option.
